item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 29, 2025 at 1:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Long live American Science and Surplus (which needs your help) (130 points | 30 comments)
2. A toy RTOS inside Super Mario Bros. using emulator save states (134 points | 28 comments)
3. Show HN: I rewrote my Mac Electron app in Rust (394 points | 278 comments)

5. Japan Post launches 'digital address' system (170 points | 118 comments)
6. US Trade Court Finds Trump Tariffs Illegal (181 points | 125 comments)
7. Compiling a neural net to C for a speedup (187 points | 64 comments)
8. Visualize and debug Rust programs with a new lens (103 points | 9 comments)
9. What does “Undecidable” mean, anyway (66 points | 62 comments)
10. What If We Had Bigger Brains? Imagining Minds Beyond Ours (66 points | 68 comments)

25. Mathematical Fiction (68 points | 18 comments)

27. Getting a Cease and Desist from Waffle House (247 points | 146 comments)

29. Prohibition and ice cream in the US Navy (69 points | 85 comments)
